lovestory.title: Our Love Story
lovestory.text: Our love story started six years ago and now the day is here – a wedding! This page of our story symbolises and carries the intention of becoming a family and the joy of sharing a life. In that we found a deeper love surfacing and something we are excited to be held in ceremony. We keep re-discovering our path in life, small and big. And here we are!

celebration.title: The celebration
celebration.text:
The party and ceremony will take place in the cute greenhouse of Backagården Café, Östra Kustvägen 987, 271 77 Löderup, around a 1 hour drive from Malmö.

Here is the approximate flow of the day:

  • 12.30–14.00 Bus from Malmö to the venue (more info about this will come). If you drive your own car there is parking at the venue.
  • 14.30–15.30 Ceremony in the garden (if it isn’t raining).
  • 15.30–16.00 Time for photos and bridal cheers.
  • 16.00–18.00 Mingle with lots of tapas and drinks in the garden (weather permitting).
  • 18.30–20.00 Seated dinner with toasts.
  • 20.00–22.00 Open space for surprise activities.
  • 22.00–01.00 Dancing, cake and coziness.
  • 01.30–03.00 Bus back to Malmö.

familyspace.title: Family space
familyspace.text: Your children are super welcome to join us, we love to have them there! Just please be prepared to take care of possible crying and screaming during the ceremony. There will not be any special food for children or held activities but a friendly atmosphere. If you have questions about this, just connect with us.

language.title: Language
language.text:
Since our love story is a mix of two languages, our wedding will represent this and it is really important for us that everyone feels included. Therefore we will hold the ceremony in English and Spanish. This will make everything a bit longer but we hope it will contribute to the space and offer a possibility for more slowness and depth.

Speeches: There will be a possibility to hold a speech during the dinner (we really love this!). If you wish to do so, you will need to write it down and send it to XXXXX two weeks before the wedding so that it can be translated (in written). You can always write something and then speak from your heart in the moment, but then at least everyone gets a chance to hear you.

dresscode.title: Dresscode
dresscode.text: Whatever you feel the most beautiful in! Bring something warmer for the evening, especially if you are from the south! Swedish summers are very bright and lovely but it can be around 18 degrees. We are going to be on grass so don’t bring heels (also we want to see you on the dancefloor!).

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.text: We wish for your presence at the wedding and if anything, a contribution for our honeymoon. You can swish to 0701991100 or make a transfer to  (Spanish account) marked with 'love story'. No wrapped gifts!

cocreate.title: Co-create with us
cocreate.text: We would love for you to feel included and participate in the celebration! There will be some open space during the evening for you to bring a little game, song you want to sing or a ceremonial thing you wish to offer. If you wish to do this or have an idea, please contact XXXXXX who will help us organize it.

afterglow.title: A three day part - Afterglow and hangout
afterglow.text: Some of you we haven’t seen in a long time and you might have traveled far, and we would love to create a little bit more time to hang out and enjoy the afterglow together! The celebration will end around 1pm and a bus will take everyone back to Malmö. But if you wish and have the possibility to stay until the 14th, we invite you to come to our house in Malmö (on the Saturday and Sunday). Maybe we will organise a brunch in the city somewhere and then go back to our garden and hang out there (play games, drink coffee, beers, chat, be cozy, have a sauna… the sky is the limit), or if the weather is really nice, maybe go to the beach and have a swim and order some pizzas for the night. We live at Ljunggatan 28, so you could book a place to sleep close by and then find your flow into the afterglow! Just let us know if you have any questions.
